aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: I am Frontend developer with 3+ years experience in web application development. Currently I use mainly frameworks React and Vue.js. I am trying to keep up with new developing trends and incorporate them in the code I write.

skills.react: I was developing a videoplatform app, several e-shops or for example chrome and teams extension in the most used framework today.
skills.vue: Vue.js is becoming more and more popular and I personally used it to develop a Project Management App and application that monitors activity on firewalls.
skills.grapqhl: If connection from api or database is needed in web application, I usually choose Graphql.
skills.nodejs: But I am able also create a backend application only in javascript using Node.
skills.postgresql: To do that, you need to know at least basic of database behavior. In PostgreSQL I am able to write even more complex commands.
skills.mysql: Couple times when I worked on website with smaller structure I also used MySQL.

latestProjects.title: Latest projects
latestProjects.description1: I started programming in php already in high school. Since joining Denevy s.r.o. I went through several project where Laravel framework was used.
latestProjects.description2: However after some time I was enjoying working with user interface more and that was no longer possible without Javascript. I started developing single page apps in React and Vue.js at the same time because I found both very interesting and even today I can´t choose which framework I prefer more.
latestProjects.description3: I was part of several project using both, In React was the most fundamental project of the new videoplatform iVysílání for Czech television, which had a release in December 2021.
latestProjects.description4: In Vue.js I was working on Interconnector and Firewall Auditor applications in the field of cyber security automation at Synapsa Networks. And now I am working as Senior Developer on the project management application called Juno.one.

whatExpect.title: What you can expect from me?
whatExpect.description: Coding is not just a job for me, it is also my biggest hobby. Before I specialized in javascript solutions I also developer in PHP (Laravel). Now in my free time I try apps in Kotlin, Java or Python. When I am not satisfied enough I assemble and program simple Arduino robots. I also try to gain a greater insight into Internet technologies in general. Mainly by reading non/scientific literature.

blockDescription.communication: I prefer to work in a team than working alone. Whether the job is remote or there is contact in the office. In the past I was responsible to maintain communication between each development teams during release process.
blockDescription.code: I am constantly trying to educate myself when new technologies are coming and use them. I am also trying to write sustainable code, best based on unit testing and typescript.
blockDescription.motivation: In my work motivation ranking there is always the opportunity to learn new things, technologies and project management tasks at the top.

form.name: Name
form.responseMessage: Thank's for your message. I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
